about_the_game:
Fill a whole city with the classic look of Gatsby-era elegance with the Art Deco Exteriors tileset for RPG Maker!

The Art Deco Exteriors Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Water and waterfalls
Plain floors in charcoal gray, pale gray, gold and maroon
Tile floors in charcoal gray, pale gray, gold and maroon
Raised curbs for sidewalks
Grass and dirt tiles
Fancy tables
Decorative edges
and more!

Walls/roofs:

Window autotiles in a wide variety of styles, with red and gold frames, plus walls to match most styles of flooring. Also includes more brick patterns and gold-edged wall panels to add more detail.

Also includes:

Stairs
Lighting (light posts, wall mounted lanterns, wall mounted fan shapes; all have lit and unlit versions)
Stores – sale signs, products, window displays, old cash register
Road tilesets – lines and stripes, arrows, stop signs
Mailboxes (two styles)
Outdoor furniture – patio table, seating (chairs and sofas)
Fancy windows (several styles)
Grand staircases
Tons of large and small architectural elements – mix and match to make unique buildings, storefronts, you name it!
Trees
Roof tiles

Events and Animations

3 styles of vintage cars in 4 colors
Large and small door animations

Fill a whole city with the classic look of Gatsby-era elegance with the Art Deco Exteriors tileset for RPG Maker!

The Art Deco Exteriors Tileset Includes:

Walls/roofs:

Window autotiles in a wide variety of styles, with red and gold frames, plus walls to match most styles of flooring. Also includes more brick patterns and gold-edged wall panels to add more detail.

Also includes:
